pr_title: Generated gRPC interfaces should be annotated as `@FunctionalInterface`

timeline.bodyText: This will add annotation only for the Blocking*Rpc interfaces, you should do the same in another forEach above.
timeline.author: idelpivnitskiy

timeline.bodyText: Please, prefer assertThat instead of assertNotNull and assertEquals. It produces better exception messages in case of failures.
timeline.author: idelpivnitskiy

timeline.bodyText: We do not have RpcPaths enum anymore. Looks like you used the old generated code. To regenerate it, use ./gradlew clean classes testClasses.
timeline.author: idelpivnitskiy

timeline.bodyText: Because we want to test all 4 different API variants and we know that Tester class defines them all, I would make sure that the size of both Lists is 4.
timeline.author: idelpivnitskiy

timeline.message:
Generated gRPC RPC interfaces should be annotated as `@FunctionalInterface` #908

Motivation:

Generated gRPC RPC interfaces should be annotated as `@FunctionalInterface` #908

Modifications:

- add `@FunctionalInterface` to generated interfaces as part of the method addServiceRpcInterfaces()
- add test scope dependency `servicetalk-grpc-protoc` for `servicetalk-grpc-netty`
- add `GeneratorTest`

Result:

Fixes #908
